failure.message:
Timed out retrying: cy.dblclick() failed because this element is detached from the DOM.
Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them. The previous command that ran was: > cy.as() This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command. Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands. https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom

failure.message:
Timed out retrying: cy.dblclick() failed because this element is detached from the DOM.
<button data-v-363ada02="" data-v-c8c907ec="" class="btn primary">...</button>
Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them.
The previous command that ran was:
> cy.contains()
This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command.
Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element
You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands.
https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom
